sql.search: SELECT main.uid ,main.enterprise_uid ,main.area_cd ,main.area_name ,main.dept_uid ,dept.dept_name ,main.disp_seq ,main.remark ,main.insert_user ,main.update_user ,main.insert_date ,main.update_date ,main.record_status ,insert_user.user_name insert_user_name ,update_user.user_name update_user_name FROM cmn_area main LEFT JOIN sys_dept dept ON dept.uid = main.dept_uid AND dept.dept_class = 1 LEFT JOIN sys_user insert_user ON insert_user.uid = main.insert_user LEFT JOIN sys_user update_user ON update_user.uid = main.update_user WHERE main.record_status = 1
sql.checkDelete: SELECT 1 FROM cmn_city city LEFT JOIN cmn_area area ON area.uid = city.area_uid WHERE city.record_status = 1 %s LIMIT 1
